txt.en:
'Greetings, [placeholder]. I am glad to see an adventurer such as yourself.

'I have been keeping track of the kergrim in Tûkurdul below and I begin to worry for our safety. The cliff itself is our only defence, and with the lift destroyed we would be unable to escape should they choose to attack.

'I ask that you travel down into Tûkurdul and thin out the number of kergrim in the area. It would make us much safer here in Ashâgir if you would.'
Return to Khânah and let him know that the hideout will now be safe from the kergrim.
Return to Khânah and update him on the kergrim
Khânah has a growing concern with the kergrim below the cliffs in Tûkurdul and asks you to get rid of them.

'You have returned. I have noticed less activity as of late from down in Tûkurdul. I am to believe that this is your doing.\n\n'We shall be much safer now because of what you have accomplished here. I thank you.'
Khânah has asked you to get rid of the kergrim in Tûkurdul at the bottom of the cliffs to help make the hideout safer for the people who remain.
